name: Spring bots
description:
Description

Spring bots is a 2D platform game with a pixelart style art based on the NES games. The game is inspired by games like Super meat boy, Give Up and Spewer, flash games that were popular by many youtubers a long time ago.

Spring bots tests players with levels that increase in difficulty as you progress. If you are looking for a challenge to put your skills to the test, this is your game.

Controls ActionKeys (Keyboard)Buttons (Gamepad)MovementA, D, Right arrow, Left arrowLeft stickDouble jumpW, Space, Up arrowAPauseEscapeStart Language

English, Spanish , Portuguese and Japanese(日本語).
